scripts.build-extension-newtab: copyfiles -e "./public/manifest.json" -e "./public/background.js" -u 1 ./public/**/* build-newtab && node -e "require('fs').rename('./build-newtab/manifest-newtab.json', './build-newtab/manifest.json', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
